LevelCrossingController

Method Detail

changeState

public void changeState()
Cycles the state of the lights according to predetermined order.

colourAllLights

public void colourAllLights()
Uses the value of state to determine the colour of the lights and sets them as such. Turns off (set to black) all lights before lighting the lamp that is supposed to be lit according to the specification (changing colour).

Find out how many times red lights should flash at the crossing. Simulates length of train at crossing.
